title: Can Jhin players get an option to not go further with their Mastery?
body: So they can stay forever at level 4? Such perfection should not be ruined.

replies.body: just press b if he starts flashing white, this cancels the evolution
I don't get it. I'm missing the joke. What is the significance of Jhin and champion mastery ?

[I like the suggestion
in this thread better.
Works out for four
times the mastery glory.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/hOBYv9LY-400-necessary-jhin-buff)
... This Jhin and the number 4 thing is turning into another Graves needs his cigar meme...................... :(
It's at 16 upvotes, 4x4, keep it that way.
